3 bugs fixed:
- Inbound calls from existing contacts failing in some cases (bug introduced in v3.3.1), now working 100% as expected
- Get Demo Call and Customize Voicemail buttons were disabled (bug introduced in v3.3.1), now re-enabled
Enjoy calling and texting with Ring4!
